alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:52PM EDT until May 06 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...SOUTHEASTERN YORK...SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY AND EAST CENTRAL SURRY COUNTIES...THE WESTERN CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Smithfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Christopher Newport University, Fort Eustis and Beaconsdale around 600 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field, Denbigh and Lee Hall around 605 PM EDT. Newport News, Hampton and Tabb around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Carrollton, Lackey, Water Country U.S.A., Benns Church, Oriana, Lawson, Bacons Castle, Dare and Newport News Golf Course. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Surry; York
